intro: Ambu-Lenz is an analytics tool designed to extract data from ambulance response simulations. This data can then provide insights on how to better organize resources for a more efficient emergency response service.

history.title: History of Simulations
history.brief: All previously run simulations are listed below. Each item can be viewed more in depth by going to its analysis page.

historyOpt.title: History of Optimizations
historyOpt.brief: All previously run optimizations are listed below. Each item can be viewed more in depth by going to its details page.

analysis.title: Analysis of Simulation
analysis.brief: In depth analysis of this simulation is shown below

details.title: Details for Optimization
details.brief: Results of the optimization are displayed here.
details.alloBrief: The depots are given below along with the number of ambualnces allocated to them.

opt.title: System Optimizer
opt.brief: Optimize the emergency response system to ensure effective use of resources
